Package my.uum

Class Class_C

java.lang.Object
my.uum.Class_A
my.uum.Class_B
my.uum.Class_C
public class Class_C
extends Class_B
This class is for calculating the Course Marks and the Grading of Course Marks.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    double d
    This attribute represent the Final Exam Marks.
    double e
    This attribute represent the 40% of Final Exam Marks.
    char x
    This attribute represent the Grading of Course Marks.

    This method is for getting the input of Final Exam Marks.
    double get_e()
    This method is for getting the 40% of Final Exam Marks.
    double sum()
    This method is for calculating 60% of Total Carry Marks by combining Total Quiz, Test and Assignment Marks.

      public double get_d()
      This method is for getting the input of Final Exam Marks.
      Returns:
      Final Exam Marks.

    • get_e

      public double get_e()
      This method is for getting the 40% of Final Exam Marks.
      Returns:
      40% of Final Exam Marks.

    • disp_e

      public void disp_e()
      This method is for letting the user input Final Exam Marks and displaying the Matric No, Total Quiz, Test, Assignment Marks, Total Carry Marks, Final Exam Marks, Course Marks and the Grading of Course Marks. The Marks must be between 0 - 100%.

    • sum1

      public double sum1()
      This method is for calculating the 40% of Final Exam Marks.
      Returns:
      40% of Final Exam Marks.

    • sum

      public double sum()
      This method is for calculating 60% of Total Carry Marks by combining Total Quiz, Test and Assignment Marks.
      Overrides:
      sum in class Class_B
      Returns:
      Total Carry Marks.
